meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6821.

td.p: Kris Voss, a doctoral student from Durham, North Carolina
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois
Frédérique Delaprée, a foreign service officer from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (whose 2-day cash winnings total $20,800)

tr.td: ABOARD "SHIP"
THE CAPTAIN
THE CREW
THE FIRST MATE
THE SALE MAKER
HIGGS, BOSUN
